data.system_settings: iPhone 7 Plus, iOS 11.3 Public Beta (This bug appears also on older versions of iOS 11. It's not an issue of the beta)
data.actual_result: Unlike in every other iOS app only the app's name gets pasted
data.expected_result: The app's name and an App Store link should be pasted
data.short_description: Unable to paste App Store links in Discord
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to an app in the App Store (It doesn't matter which one)  - Tap on the blue button with the three white dots - Tap on "Share App..." - Tap on "Copy Link" - Try to paste the link in Discord (It doesn't matter if it is a DM or a channel)
